presentation FHS is best heard midway 
between the line joining the umbilicus and the anterior 
superior iliac spine on the side of the back
 ∙ In breech presentation FHS is heard above the umbilicus
 ∙ Count the FHS for one full minute (FHR)
Figure 11: Location of FHS using foetoscope
Figure 10: Auscultation of FHS

Key points to remember
